title: The Man Who Called for an Ambulance

infobox.Title:: The Man Who Called for an Ambulance
infobox.Japanese title:: 救急車を呼びに行った男  (Kyūkyūsha o Yobi ni Itta Otoko)
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Yoshiharu Yamada as Hiroshi Hiromatsu  Rikiya Koyama as Taizo Sakurada  Aya Hara as Yukiko Yasunaga  Isshin Chiba as Forensics officer  Tōru Takahashi as Paramedic  Katsuyuki Konishi as Ryoji Mizuhara

sections.Situation:
One day, a man named Hiroshi Hiromatsu was jogging and finds a dead body.

He calls the ambulance but worries about the man's life, so he decides to run to the nearest bus station. And because of his actions, he is considered the main suspect.
sections.People:
- 28 years old

- Takagi's friend
- Detective from the eastern police headquarters
